casebody.data:
Ralph B. Strassburger, Appellant, v. Singer Manufacturing Company et al., Respondents. May B. Strassburger et al., Appellants, v. Singer Manufacturing Company et al., Respondents.

Reported below, 263 App. Div. 518.

Submitted November 23, 1942; decided December 10, 1942. Conn Cohalan, Daniel F. Cohalan, Jr., and Emil Morosini, Jr., for motions. Arthur Richenthal and A. Lincoln Lavine opposed.

Motions granted.
